text: My oldest Squash partner.............aur log Squash me mujhe Summer camp me mile lekin tum to CPA se satah me the. Apna vo Old Sec me saath jaakr khelna aur Mohit ki vajah se apna bond acha hota gaya. Uske baad Volly khelna raat me tumhari wing ke saath, itni sab memories hain tumhare saath. Bas Squash khelna hai saath me aur mauka mila to zaroor khelenge. Tab tak ke liye Tata
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Hi Abha.....Met you first time during TA202A group formation and I will say it was an accidental group formed. Sab group bana rahe the aur mai aise hi tha. It was a good time working in group when we didn't know names in the starting of each other. And the most important thing wo TA guide ka chillana aur tume aur Pratigya ko bas ek saath gear banane ke liye bhej dena. Lekin at last apna project acha bana tha. Last night jab poore group ne ek saath report submit ki........Uske baad to jyada interaction nahi hua but still got a good friend in CHE who is always ready to help. Tumhare assignments se kaafi help ho jaati thi especially ESO205A me. Stay happy and cheerful as you are. Tatata
author: Aviral  Singh

text:
Jab bhi humari baat hogi to Sainik School sabse pehle aayega. Jo bond 2 Sainik school vaalon ke beech me ho sakta hai vo normally nahi hota. Starting from the PHY101 lab jahan hum lab partners the, baaki log values nikal ke graph banate the aur answers nikalte the, Vahi hume reverse pattern follow krte the. Pehle answer aur uske baad values manipulate krte the. PHY101 ki first lab me hi TA se mera ladai krna and all. Vahan se jo bond develop hua vo aaj usse kahi jyada strong hai. Iss bond ka bas ek hi reason hai aur vo hai Sainik School. Uske baad CHE courses me saath baithna, Labs saath me krna aur courses to humne saath me paar kiye jisme pata hi nahi lagta tha kya chal raha hai lekin humne paar kr liye. CHE352 me bhi saath me lab krna aur report bana. Labs aur classes ke incident to jitne likhu kam hain.
Sports ki baaton me to alag feel aa jaati thi. Hum class me baithke apne apne sports ki baatein discuss krte the ek doosre se ki kya chal raha. Hockey ki bahut baatein discuss ki aur assignments chaapna, lekin kabhi pakde nahi gaye. 4 saal kaise saath me nikal gaye pata hi nahi chala.
Logon ki insight to mai deta rehta hai aur tum samjh rahe kaun si insight ki baat kr raha mai. Poore campus ki uss type ki news mai tumhe batata tha jo mai collect krta tha various sources se.
Placemene me tumne to gazab hi machaya bhai. Jin logon ne preparation ki unka na hua lekin tumne bina preparation ke macha diya. Placement to bas ek step hai tumhare career me lekin mujhe pata hai jahan tumhara aim hai you can rock kyuki approach positive honi chahiye aur vo hai.
Bas thoda bura ye lag raha ki last ke days me saath nahi reh paaye varna shayad aur mauj masti krte 
lekin ho na saka. But jaldi hi milenge kyuki college khatam ho sakta hai lekin hamari friendship nahi. Ghar bhi apna paas paas hai to jaldi hi milenge. Aur phone pe to hamesha connected. Jab Sainik school gya tha tab roya tha aur jab usse nikala to aur jyada roya. leikn aaj Sainik school se nikalne vaali feeling aa rahi.........................
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Hello brother, Hum TA mile because we all have no group and accidentally we landed in the same group. TA ki lab me bahut maje kiya aur guide ne sabse jyada kaam kiya apne group me. Wo meets ka decide krna aur hum dono inspection krne jaate the guide ne kitna kaam kr liya. At last hamara project finish ho gaya aur project presentation me cheeze workout ho gayi. thanks to GOD. Uske baad jyada baat to nahi hue but you quotes are really powerful and they all have a deep meaning from inside. It was a very nice to work with you and meet with you. Apni TA ke labs me Sainik school ki baatein was always a fun. Stay happy and cheerful brother. Bye.
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Hello Taekwondo man, Academic me to hamesha sath hi rahe hain, saare classes saath me attend krna aur classes ke beech me canteen jaana. TA me dono project me saath the apan. Canon kuch jyada hi backchod ban gayi thi apni to. Baaki yaar bahut time apan logon ne saath me spend kiya. Classes me saath me backchodi krna aur attendence maar ke nikal jaana. Stay cool and best luck for the future.
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Namarashi Shukla ji. Jab bhi end-sem ya mid-sem me seating arrangement hua to tum mere left me the. Saare mid-sem aur end-sem ek taraf aur LIF101 ka ek taraf. Jo tumne mid-sem aur end-sem me cheating karayi uski vajah se bahut ache marks aa gaye bhai. Baaki uske baad TA ka exam ho ya kisi CHE course ka, jab jab maine bola tumne cheating karayi. CHE ke courses saath me krne hi the lekin luckily HSS bhi hamesha same hi milta tha. Aur notes to bhai gazab banate ho. Kaafi emmories hain saath especially UOP1 lab ki. Last moment me tumhare room me report banana aur readings lete samay change krna readings. UOP1 me to maze kiye hain humne Laddha ke saath. Thanks for all those memories that will stay with throughout the life.........
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Kota se same batch me aur uske baad same IIT. TT aur Squash, yahi 2 topics hote the baat krne ke liye apne paas. Tera vo CPI ke liye rona aur phir toote pair se TT khelna. Teri captaincy me Gold aana..............Jaisi ho vaise rehna mastmaula
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Hey Deeksha, Got to know more about you during the Design project, interacted very late during the college life but its nice we interacted than never. It was all fun to work with you during that project as you were the most helping out of all the group members. The project became successful because of you. Also we share the similar hometown. Best wishes for your future ahead. Bye
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Jassi boy...........It was a great time with you in 3rd year especially when you were GenSec. Sports ka discuss krna, Team me kuch needs hoti to sabse pehle tumko approach krna. Inter IIT ke baare me discuss krna aur bahut kuch yaar. Hamesha help ki hai tumne. Baaki raat ko Volleyball khelna vo sabse maze ka event tha. Teri wing aur meri wing se mai aur Harshit. Bhai raat ko 2 baje tak volley uske baad canteen.................Last time nahi mil paaya lekin abhi to ho tum 1 saal...campus aaya to jaroor milenge....till then Tata jassi paaji
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Hey Jaya, ESO205 ki Lab me bas time pass krna aur prof ke assignments ke baare me discuss krna. Readings sahi na aane pe fraud maarna, ye sab to khoob kiya hai uss sem me
author: Aviral  Singh

text:
Hey Kanishka, the first time I contacted you was regarding the project under Prof. Vishal Agarwal because you were doing project under him. I guess you were more happy than me when I got an opportunity to work under him. During the second year summer, I learnt various things about the project from you regarding the project, got the help from you again and again for a small problem in the project. You taught me how to use VASP and HPC and all the stuffs. It was great to spent time with you during the project. During the third year we started talking a little more due to almost same courses. After that we started taking the same  OE courses before discussion and the things went on. Then the random calls and discussion about the internship, life and all the silly stuffs. Ransom talks
about the professors and all.  I guess you don't have cheated much during the exams before college life but you started that in the PHY473A also. Doing the crypto  in the same group was a lot fun. We spent whole day in cracking the DES but at last we figured out that our code is wrong. Also PHY690W was also a fun with you. You shown extraordinary performance by writing the codes in the last moment. It was one of my best group to work with you in PHY690W, raat me PPT banana
and report late me submit krna, all the things were fun. Assignments bhi bahut tumse copy kiya aur pakde nahi gaye. At last I want to say that stay happy as be cheerful as you are. Hope we will meet soon kyuki you have lot of pending treats that you said to give me. tab tak Bye rahega.
author: Aviral  Singh

text: KG.........the first year and the mini militia with you. Tera jab phone vikram vaale ne le liya tha tab apan log gaye the usse dhoodhne aur almost mil hi gaya tha lekin thoda sa mistake ho gaya tha. Aur baaki teri cycle ke saath experiment krna and all the good time we had togather. Bas jaise ho vaise rehna aur life me nayi cheeze try krte raho. :)
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Heyy Ladki.........Met you during the summer camp when I played Mafia with TT team. TT team ko Soni ki vajah se sabse ache se jaanta tha. Baaki CHE me saath hote hue bhi jyada baat nahi ho paayi lekin during COVID kaafi conversation hue. Mangal ke course me cheatings ke plan krna, PPTs collect krna aur other cheating ke resources ko collect krna, It was all fun. Maine bola hai jab koi dikkat ho to just remember me and you remembered. Bas stay happy and cheerful and remain in contact as we are........Stay happy and enjoy life to the fullest
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Hey TA202 Cad partner............Wo CAD banane ke liye common free time nikalna from Squash and dance and other activities. It was all fun to do TA project togather after forming an accidental group. Guide was like - "Pratigya and Abha will manufacture gears". And the most important thing when our group met for the first time in CCD, we were introducing ourselves to each other and then you asked a random person to introduce. After project evaluation me CCD me time spend kiya and shared a lot in the 3rd semester. Wishing you a great life ahead :)
author: Aviral  Singh

text:
Dekh bhai agar likhne baitha to shayad poora saal nikal jayega kyuki itna kuch saath me kiya. Bhai tu na hota to shayad mera backhand na sahi hota aur tum ho jo hamesha motivate krte the ki kr lo thode din aur aur ho jayega backhand acha. Lekin jab bhi tumhare saath match khela hai ek alaga hi tumse kuch seekhne ko mila hai. Saare tournaments me ek cheez common thi ki tum hamesha hote the mujhe chear up krne ke liye aur sets ke beech me tips dene ke liye. Kuch tournaments to hamesha yaad rahenge. Kuch matches mai tumhare hamesha yaad rakhunga: -
1) KGP ke saath Udghosh me semifinal, 4th set me tumne saans rok di thi poori team thi.
2) Suchit ko ek set me 7 nick maarna, bhaiya kaise kr lete ho
3) Inter_IIT ke Championship Ball pe mNick maarke point lena, bahut bahut confidence chahiye
4) UP State me tera match, bhai khatarnaak machaya tha tumne
5) Tizil aur Ansh ke saath tere matches
Bhai bahut time spend kiya court me aur court ke baad late night panchayat team ke saath. Bas tumse milne ki bahut jaldi hai, abhi to saath me Hall 1 ka DCBM intazaar kr raha. Shayad tum na hote to ye team na hoti. Mai kahi bhi khel lu Squash lekin mera captain to tum hi rahoge kyuki Squash me tumne jitna tumne mujhe samjha hai utna kisi ne nahi. From First year summer camp till date, best squash to maine tumhare saath hi khela hai. First year summer camp me cross country me maine aur Avinash ne kya acha sa shortcut maara tha. Kaafi kaand bhi kiye hai tumne. Ek Udghosh ki video edit krke kaand krna. Techkriti 19 me tumhe maine aur Sir ne raat ko 3 baje chai peene bheja tha. Dil bhar gaya hai itna likhte likhte and Nostalgia is killing me brother. apan dono to poori zindagi contact me rehne vaale hain, foreign jaroor aaunga tumse milne aur tumhari behna ke saath. Abhi ke liye itna hi, baaki milte hai jaldi se.
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Hamara Pandit...........ESO208A se lekr DS aur abhi tak aur aage bhi.........bhai shayad itni memories hain ki memoir nahi likh sakta.................Bas stay connected and thats all I want to say.
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Yo Squash partner..........Bhai tumhe Squash khelta dekhe lagta tha apun ko bhi aisa banana hai aur aise hi khelna hai......lekin ayar summer camp days were amazing. Bahut miss krta hu unko aur morning session me itna physical exercise krne ke baad shaam ko 4 baje practice. It was great time. Mauka mila to pakka se khelenge aur jaise mast rehte ho vaise rehne. Bas mast raho aur khush raho. tab tak ke liye Tata...........
author: Aviral  Singh

text: Yo Vakul...........bhai shayad tum ho jiske saath maine sabse jyada time spend kiya summer camp me. Sabse jyada matches bhi tumse khele Summer Camp me aur morning session me apan dono saath me running krte the. Sanket to aage hi rehta tha to apan dono mast saath me running krte the. Bhai vo din aaj bhi sabse jyada miss krta hu. Vo sessions aur vo tera incident jab tum Video call kr rahe the Court ke andar se jo Avinash ne pakad liya tha. Mauka mila to jaroor khelenge kyuki vo din aaj bhi bahut miss krta hu. Vo Arpit ki lena, Sanket ka Dosa laana other teams ke players se aur bhi bahut kuch..........Bas aaj tak ye nahi pata chala paaya ki tera kuch tha ya nahi.........you know what I mean.........Uske baad Placement me jo tumne machaya hai Shortlist hone me..........tabahi laa di thi...........Bhai happy for you ...........jaise ho mast vaise rehna......milte hain jaldi tab tak ke liye Tata..........
author: Aviral  Singh
